insights.title: Excellent Core Web Vitals
insights.description: All pages pass CWV thresholds with LCP < 2.2s, FID < 80ms, and CLS < 0.08. This directly impacts AI crawl prioritization.

insights.title: Comprehensive Schema Markup
insights.description: 85% of pages have appropriate structured data, helping AI understand your content semantically.

insights.title: JavaScript Rendering Issues
insights.description: 12 pages rely heavily on client-side rendering, potentially invisible to AI crawlers.

issues.impact: Client-rendered content may not be indexed by AI crawlers
International content causes AI confusion on regional targeting
Fragments site architecture signals for crawlers

recommendations.title: Implement SSR for Critical Pages
recommendations.action: Convert client-rendered pages to server-side rendering for better AI crawlability.

recommendations.title: Add Hreflang Markup
recommendations.action: Implement proper hreflang tags for all international content variations.

recommendations.title: Fix Broken Links
recommendations.action: Repair or redirect all broken internal links to maintain crawl efficiency.
